title: Baby Carrier
description: black with dull embroidered panels and medallions, straps; top center medallion has three dimensional effect; patterns outlined with narrow, couched metal strips; red straps with green flowers; lower panel has center floral design with scrolls and appears to have been cut from another piece and glued to this one; lower panel edge has purple and blue 2\" border; lined in blue denim-type fabric
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
